004
005package edu.wpi.first.networktables;
006
007/**
008 * NetworkTables event.
009 *
010 * <p>There are different kinds of events. When creating a listener, a combination of event kinds
011 * can be listened to by building an EnumSet of NetworkTableEvent.Kind.
012 */
013@SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
014public final class NetworkTableEvent {
015  public enum Kind {
016    /**
017     * Initial listener addition. Set this to receive immediate notification of matches to other
018     * criteria.
019     */
020    kImmediate(0x0001),
021
022    /** Client connected (on server, any client connected). */
023    kConnected(0x0002),
024
025    /** Client disconnected (on server, any client disconnected). */
026    kDisconnected(0x0004),
027
028    /** Any connection event (connect or disconnect). */
029    kConnection(0x0004 | 0x0002),
030
031    /** New topic published. */
032    kPublish(0x0008),
033
034    /** Topic unpublished. */
035    kUnpublish(0x0010),
036
037    /** Topic properties changed. */
038    kProperties(0x0020),
039
040    /** Any topic event (publish, unpublish, or properties changed). */
041    kTopic(0x0020 | 0x0010 | 0x0008),
042
043    /** Topic value updated (via network). */
044    kValueRemote(0x0040),
045
046    /** Topic value updated (local). */
047    kValueLocal(0x0080),
048
049    /** Topic value updated (network or local). */
050    kValueAll(0x0080 | 0x0040),
051
052    /** Log message. */
053    kLogMessage(0x0100);
054
055    private final int value;
056
057    Kind(int value) {
058      this.value = value;
059    }
060
061    public int getValue() {
062      return value;
063    }
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Handle of listener that was triggered. The value returned when adding the listener can be used
068   * to map this to a specific added listener.
069   */
070  public final int listener;
071
072  /**
073   * Determine if event is of a particular kind. For example, kPublish if the topic was not
074   * previously published. Also indicates the data included with the event:
075   *
076   * <ul>
077   *   <li>kConnected or kDisconnected: connInfo
078   *   <li>kPublish, kUnpublish, or kProperties: topicInfo
079   *   <li>kValueRemote, kValueLocal: valueData
080   *   <li>kLogMessage: logMessage
081   * </ul>
082   *
083   * @param kind Kind
084   * @return True if event matches kind
085   */
086  public boolean is(Kind kind) {
087    return (m_flags & kind.getValue()) != 0;
088  }
089
090  private final int m_flags;
091
092  /** Connection information (for connection events). */
093  public final ConnectionInfo connInfo;
094
095  /** Topic information (for topic events). */
096  public final TopicInfo topicInfo;
097
098  /** Value data (for value events). */
099  public final ValueEventData valueData;
100
101  /** Log message (for log message events). */
102  public final LogMessage logMessage;
103
104  /**
105   * Constructor. This should generally only be used internally to NetworkTables.
106   *
107   * @param inst Instance
108   * @param listener Listener that was triggered
109   * @param flags Event flags
110   * @param connInfo Connection information
111   * @param topicInfo Topic information
112   * @param valueData Value data
113   * @param logMessage Log message
114   */
115  public NetworkTableEvent(
116      NetworkTableInstance inst,
117      int listener,
118      int flags,
119      ConnectionInfo connInfo,
120      TopicInfo topicInfo,
121      ValueEventData valueData,
122      LogMessage logMessage) {
123    this.m_inst = inst;
124    this.listener = listener;
125    this.m_flags = flags;
126    this.connInfo = connInfo;
127    this.topicInfo = topicInfo;
128    this.valueData = valueData;
129    this.logMessage = logMessage;
130  }
131
132  /* Network table instance. */
133  private final NetworkTableInstance m_inst;
134
135  /**
136   * Gets the instance associated with this event.
137   *
138   * @return Instance
139   */
140  public NetworkTableInstance getInstance() {
141    return m_inst;
142  }
143}
